ch.iserver.ace.net
Interface NetworkServiceCallback

All Known Implementing Classes:
CollaborationServiceImpl
public interface NetworkServiceCallback

The NetworkServiceCallback interface is used by the NetworkService for calling the client of itself. Typically the client is an object from the logic layer that implements this callback interface.

Method Summary
 void documentDetailsChanged(RemoteDocumentProxy proxy)
          Notifies the callback that the document details of the given document changed.
 void documentDiscarded(RemoteDocumentProxy[] proxy)
          Notifies the callback that previously present documents disappeared from the network.
 void documentDiscovered(RemoteDocumentProxy[] proxy)
          Notifies the callback that new documents were discovered on the network.
 void invitationReceived(InvitationProxy invitation)
          Notifies the callback that an invitation was received.
 void serviceFailure(int code, String msg, Exception e)
          Notifies the callback about a service failure in the network layer.
 void userDetailsChanged(RemoteUserProxy proxy)
          Notifies the callback that the user details of the given RemoteUserProxy changed.
 void userDiscarded(RemoteUserProxy proxy)
          Notifies the callback that a previously present user disappeared from the network.
 void userDiscovered(RemoteUserProxy proxy)
          Notifies the callback that a new user was discovered on the network.
 

Method Detail

serviceFailure

void serviceFailure(int code,
                    String msg,
                    Exception e)
Notifies the callback about a service failure in the network layer.

Parameters:
code - the error code (defined in FailureCodes)
msg - the optional message payload
e - the cause

userDiscovered

void userDiscovered(RemoteUserProxy proxy)
Notifies the callback that a new user was discovered on the network. The passed in proxy can be used to communicate with that newly discovered user.

Parameters:
proxy - the proxy for the newly discovered user

userDetailsChanged

void userDetailsChanged(RemoteUserProxy proxy)
Notifies the callback that the user details of the given RemoteUserProxy changed.

Parameters:
proxy - the proxy for the user

userDiscarded

void userDiscarded(RemoteUserProxy proxy)
Notifies the callback that a previously present user disappeared from the network.

Parameters:
proxy - the proxy for the user

documentDiscovered

void documentDiscovered(RemoteDocumentProxy[] proxy)
Notifies the callback that new documents were discovered on the network.

Parameters:
proxy - the array of document proxies

documentDetailsChanged

void documentDetailsChanged(RemoteDocumentProxy proxy)
Notifies the callback that the document details of the given document changed.

Parameters:
proxy - the proxy for the document

documentDiscarded

void documentDiscarded(RemoteDocumentProxy[] proxy)
Notifies the callback that previously present documents disappeared from the network.

Parameters:
proxy - the array of the document

invitationReceived

void invitationReceived(InvitationProxy invitation)
Notifies the callback that an invitation was received. The passed in invitation can be used to accept or reject the invitation.

Parameters:
invitation - the Invitation object that allows to accept or reject the invitation
